newsitem.title: USA: Penn Traffic names Hawkins president, CEO.
newsitem.headline: Penn Traffic names Hawkins president, CEO.

text.p: SYRACUSE, N.Y., March 12 (reuter) - Penn Traffic Co Wednesday said it named Phillip Hawkins, currently a senior vice president at Vons Cos Inc, as its new president and chief executive officer.
Hawkins will join Penn Traffic in April and will also be elected to the board of the company, which operates 265 supermarkets in upstate New York, Pennsylvania, Ohio and West Virginia.
Hawkins takes over as Penn Traffic's president following a six-month national search to replace former president John Dixon, who resigned in September for personal reasons.
